3.1 Use
Your license to use College Scavenger Hunt is limited to the number of licenses purchased by you. You shall not allow others to use, copy or evaluate copies of College Scavenger Hunt.

Each licensed copy of College Scavenger Hunt may be used on one single computer location by one user. Use of College Scavenger Hunt means that you have loaded, installed, or run College Scavenger Hunt on a computer or similar device. If you install College Scavenger Hunt onto a multi-user platform, server or network, each and every individual user of College Scavenger Hunt must be licensed separately.
You may make one copy of College Scavenger Hunt for backup purposes, providing you only have one copy installed on one computer being used by one person. Other users may not use your copy of College Scavenger Hunt . The assignment, sublicense, networking, sale, or distribution of copies of College Scavenger Hunt are strictly forbidden without the prior written consent of Tonye Brown. It is a violation of this agreement to assign, sell, share, loan, rent, lease, borrow, network or transfer the use of College Scavenger Hunt. If any person other than yourself uses College Scavenger Hunt registered in your name, regardless of whether it is at the same time or different times, then this agreement is being violated and you are responsible for that violation!

This Software contains copyrighted material, trade secrets and other proprietary material. You shall not, and shall not attempt to, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble or decompile College Scavenger Hunt. Nor can you create any derivative works or other works that are based upon or derived from College Scavenger Hunt in whole or in part.

3.4 Limitation of Responsibility

Except as expressly stated in writing, Tonye Brown makes no representation or warranties in respect of this Software and expressly excludes all other warranties, expressed or implied, oral or written, including, without limitation, any implied warranties of merchantable quality or fitness for a particular purpose.

THIS SOFTWARE AND THE ACCOMPANYING FILES ARE SOLD "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES AS TO PERFORMANCE OR MERCHANTABILITY OR ANY OTHER WARRANTIES WHETHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. THIS DISCLAIMER CONCERNS ALL FILES GENERATED AND EDITED BY College Scavenger Hunt AS WELL.
